title: Definition of x-intercept
text: The x-intercept describes the point where the function crosses the x-axis.
speech: The x-intercept describes the point where the function crosses the x-axis.
pacedSpeech: The x-intercept describes the point where the function crosses the x-axis.

title: Setting up the equation
text: Set the function equal to $$0$$. This represents the point in which the function crosses the x-axis.
speech: Set the function equal to  0 . This represents the point in which the function crosses the x-axis.
pacedSpeech: . This represents the point in which the function crosses the x-axis.

title: Solving for $$x$$
text: The last step is to solve for $$x$$.
